Term.Name: recordReplace
Term.Definition: to be recorded, replacing exiting one if it exists

Term.Name: recordAllowDuplicates
Term.Definition: to be recorded, authorize duplicate if a copy already exists : CRID for latest news, two media formats

Term.Name: recordIfNotYetExists
Term.Definition: to be recorded only if it is not yet recorded. E.g.: to complete a series without rerecording

Term.Name: remind
Term.Definition: Message coming from another device of the end-user or a friend, just for information

Term.Name: recommend
Term.Definition: preselection coming from me or suggestion coming from any user
